Sentencas: Stabilizing SrFeO3-delta in cubic structure is of great significance for its application in solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Tailoring the structural stability, electrochemical performance and CO2 tolerance of aluminum doped SrFeO3

Sentencas: Herein, a rational way is reported to tune the structure and performance of SrFeO3-delta perovskite as oxygen reduction electrodes by embedding aluminum cation in B-site.
Titulo: Tailoring the structural stability, electrochemical performance and CO2 tolerance of aluminum doped SrFeO3

Sentencas: Compared with their parent oxide, the obtained stabilized cubic perovskites SrFe1-xAlxO3-delta (x = 0.1 and 0.2) show much improved electrocatalytic activity, achieving area specific resistance values of 0.57, 0.15 and 0.34 Omega cm(2) at 700 degrees C in air for SrFeO3-delta, SrFe0.9Al0.1O3-delta and SrFe0.8Al0.2O3-delta, respectively.
Titulo: Tailoring the structural stability, electrochemical performance and CO2 tolerance of aluminum doped SrFeO3

Sentencas: Such improved performance is a result of the exceeding 2-fold increase in oxygen chemical bulk diffusion and surface exchange kinetics due to Al3+ doping.
Titulo: Tailoring the structural stability, electrochemical performance and CO2 tolerance of aluminum doped SrFeO3

Sentencas: Moreover, favorable CO2-resistance is also demonstrated.
Titulo: Tailoring the structural stability, electrochemical performance and CO2 tolerance of aluminum doped SrFeO3

Sentencas: DFT calculations are carried out to reveal the accelerated oxygen reduction reaction and enhanced CO2 tolerance.
Titulo: Tailoring the structural stability, electrochemical performance and CO2 tolerance of aluminum doped SrFeO3

Sentencas: This work indicates an aluminum dopant in B-site may provide a highly attractive strategy for the future development of cathode materials.
Titulo: Tailoring the structural stability, electrochemical performance and CO2 tolerance of aluminum doped SrFeO3
